smac.model

Class RoutingTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.model.RoutingTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RoutingTask>

    public class RoutingTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RoutingTask>
    RoutingTask defines the details of a task that must be carried out by the SMAC daemon.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
